ExecutiveSummary.one_line: Conflict-managed intervention portfolio improving regional food system resilience.

bullets.item: Strategic reserves and cold-chain capacity upgrades.

SynthesizedConclusion.KeyFinding: Cold-chain expansion and inventory buffers for perishables.
Supplier diversification with regional redundancy targets.
SynthesizedConclusion.RiskAssessment: Equity vouchers and prioritized distribution during shocks.
